Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

With a new version come new anomalies, post any anomalies you encounter here and I'll link your post to this post here!

Obvious spoilers obvious btw
I don't think there are new easter eggs in 0.21. :/
I don't think there has been new easter eggs in KSP since 0.18
Why would they tell you?

Why would they tell you?

The devs tend to do so though, they'll drop a hint that an easter egg was added. That's usually as far as they will go though. Actually in 0.20 an easter egg was removed if I remember right, the magic boulder is no longer in the game.

I tried to find Magic Boulder by editing the quicksave file to put a ship at the same point in space and time where my ship was the last time I visited Magic Boulder in 0.18 ...but I see nothing there. The ship does end up in what appears to be the correct orbit around Ike, but there is nothing in the vicinity.

So, either...

1) Magic Boulder is still MIA

2) Magic Boulder is elsewhere

3) I did something incorrectly when I edited the save file
I hope any new easter eggs can avoid mapsat detection.

I don't think there are new easter eggs in 0.21. :/
I don't think there has been new easter eggs in KSP since 0.18

Well, in 0.19 they added the [redacted] in Kerbin's North Pole and the [redacted] in Mun's south pole

EDIT:

I tried to find Magic Boulder by editing the quicksave file to put a ship at the same point in space and time where my ship was the last time I visited Magic Boulder in 0.18 ...but I see nothing there. The ship does end up in what appears to be the correct orbit around Ike, but there is nothing in the vicinity.

So, either...

1) Magic Boulder is still MIA

2) Magic Boulder is elsewhere

3) I did something incorrectly when I edited the save file

This makes me extremely sad to hear this; The Magic Boulder has been my favorite anomaly since it first came out in 0.17 and the only experience I have of it is vicariously through your AAR

Edited July 25, 2013 by AmpsterMan

I hope any new easter eggs can avoid mapsat detection.

*Sigh, the mapsat "anomaly" dots were added by it's creator. He had to manually put them there, it's not like the plugin automatically detects a new easter egg.

BTW, what's up with the old-parts easter egg on the island runway?

EDIT: Nevermind, just checked and it's right there, rustier than ever.

Edited July 26, 2013 by astropapi1

I just wanted to check my rover that was permanently halted near SQUAD Mun-olith, but I found a huge hole, which is too steep to be a crater where Mun-olith used to be near the north pole on Mun.

So... it is not the new egg but at least they changed one of those blocks, they were getting old

also I scoped area around, clipped through the ground no sign of Mun-olith.
So, are there new anomalies in .21? Lets find out!
This same thread is on the second page. Lol.
Oh, I didn't see that...

*Sigh, the mapsat "anomaly" dots were added by it's creator. He had to manually put them there, it's not like the plugin automatically detects a new easter egg.

BTW, what's up with the old-parts easter egg on the island runway?

ISA Map sat does detect anomalies. It creates a file and lists them there as and when it finds them.

ISA Map sat does detect anomalies. It creates a file and lists them there as and when it finds them.

Your right, my .20 map-sat is detecting the new terrain in .21.

Also, it appears that this Monolith can be seen in the KSC Menu:
Always been there.

BTW, what's up with the old-parts easter egg on the island runway?

They are there. What is your question about them?

Doing a quick check of the mun for old easter eggs. The places I have checked all seem to still have them. Except a few now seem to buried... Perhaps waiting to be excavated so they can send strange signals to Jool...
Could someone check up on KSC2

1) Magic Boulder is still MIA

i really hoped it would be back

If the Magic Boulder really had a problem in .21 and .20, I believe when they re-added it they might've resetted it's orientation at UT 0 to a different place, that's why you might not be seeing him Brotoro. Maybe to prevent old ave files to get him like that lol

Doing a quick check of the mun for old easter eggs. The places I have checked all seem to still have them. Except a few now seem to buried... Perhaps waiting to be excavated so they can send strange signals to Jool...

And teleport a Kerbal on surface of what seems to be a surface of a star..

If the Magic Boulder really had a problem in .21 and .20, I believe when they re-added it they might've resetted it's orientation at UT 0 to a different place, that's why you might not be seeing him Brotoro. Maybe to prevent old ave files to get him like that lol

You mean my possible explanation #2?

On Kerbin:

KSC Monolith: good

KSC Mk I Pod: good

UFO: good

Airbase Island: old parts in hangar good even though airbase rebuilt

Other KSC: buried up to 2nd floor windows

Temple: MIA == it's not even a desert there anymore.

Other Monoliths: MIA (did find a "magic boulder" at the location of one of them.

Has anyone checked the other planets? Like the meteor impact site on Eve? (perhaps a fragment broke off of a large one in Eve's atmosphere, hit the planet and caused that, and the rest flew into an orbit somehow and became Gilly? Who knows?)
